zujkomiller.genetic
Interface Chromosome

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.Comparator, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
LinearChromosome
public interface Chromosome
extends java.util.Comparator, java.io.Serializable

A Chromosome is a list of genes represented by an array of short values.

getUnscoredClone

public Chromosome getUnscoredClone()
Returns:
A Clone of this Chromosome which has the same genes as this Chromosome, but which does not have any fitness score yet.
